about_the_game:
▪ The winner is the one with the most money!
Who is great at looter shooter bounty hunter? There are many ways to earn currency in a match, and you can also spend it on something cool. The top 1 will be who can come up with the best tactics for earning during the match.

▪ Unlock and upgrade characters with overpowered skills!
Choose your own meta gun with which you will win in action against enemy robots and players.

▪ Features:
◦ Play with friends,
◦ Single-player can be played offline,
◦ Competitive multiplayer with the ranking system,
◦ Advanced AI robots,
◦ Explore the game and find all the hidden achievements,
◦ Climb to the top of the leaderboards in global rankings.

܀ Advanced Artificial Intelligence with different combat behavior, which will not let you relax. Also be careful against the Exterminator Boss, who exterminate everything in his path!

܀ Play together with your friends in PVP mode, complete quests, play offline without the Internet and your progress will still be saved!


Cyber Soldier is our the first game, we will improve and update it, so we are waiting for your feedback and suggestions. Thank you for playing ❤ :'›
detailed_description:
▪ The winner is the one with the most money!
Who is great at looter shooter bounty hunter? There are many ways to earn currency in a match, and you can also spend it on something cool. The top 1 will be who can come up with the best tactics for earning during the match.

▪ Unlock and upgrade characters with overpowered skills!
Choose your own meta gun with which you will win in action against enemy robots and players.

▪ Features:
◦ Play with friends,
◦ Single-player can be played offline,
◦ Competitive multiplayer with the ranking system,
◦ Advanced AI robots,
◦ Explore the game and find all the hidden achievements,
◦ Climb to the top of the leaderboards in global rankings.

܀ Advanced Artificial Intelligence with different combat behavior, which will not let you relax. Also be careful against the Exterminator Boss, who exterminate everything in his path!

܀ Play together with your friends in PVP mode, complete quests, play offline without the Internet and your progress will still be saved!


Cyber Soldier is our the first game, we will improve and update it, so we are waiting for your feedback and suggestions. Thank you for playing ❤ :'›

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Any equal to the iPhone 6+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any equal to the iPhone 6+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Cyber Soldier

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: Intel Core i0
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Toaster GTX
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires two controllers with joysticks
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-15900K
  • Graphics: RTX 5090
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Fast-paced competitive online multiplayer and offline survival mode, guns and overpowered skills, you and getting cash!
